channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lennar sees home prices drop to 5-year lows, but they’re still too high
item.description: Lennar sees the average price of homes delivered for the current quarter falling to the lowest levels seen in eight years.

item.title: Trump’s next Fed picks could rock your mortgage and retirement. Buckle up.
item.description: The president is testing the Fed’s limits —understanding his thinking could protect your financial future

item.title: Is the stock market open on Juneteenth? Will the post office deliver mail?
item.description: Here’s what is closed on Juneteenth this Thursday, June 19, to observe the newest federal holiday.

item.title: Solar stocks plunge on Senate bill’s tax-credit phase-out, but analysts say investors should be happy
item.description: S&P components Enphase Energy and First Solar move lower by double-digit percentages.

item.title: ‘I’m at my wit’s end’: My niece paid off her husband’s credit card, but fell behind on her taxes. How can I help her?
item.description: “My niece, as smart and brilliant as she is, is not very good with her money.”

item.title: Truist says this internet retailer's revenue is tracking above expectations so investors should buy the dip
item.description: Truist Securities pointed to rising revenue and monthly active users as catalysts that could boost Etsy shares 11% higher.

item.title: Investors are buying defense stocks as Middle East conflict worsens
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: Investor Steve Eisman says we are headed for a global recession if Trump's tariffs spark a trade war
item.description: The former Neuberger Berman senior portfolio manager said it's extremely hard to predict how these high-stakes trade negotiations would unfold.
